label: Home Decor and Furnishings
description: Search queries related to home decor and furnishings, including furniture, lighting, curtains, blinds, wallpaper, mirrors, and candles.

subcategories.label: Wall Decor
subcategories.description: Decorative items for walls, including wallpaper, wall art, and mirrors.

subcategories.label: Window Treatments
subcategories.description: Window coverings, including curtains, blinds, and shades.

subcategories.label: Furniture
subcategories.description: Indoor and outdoor furniture, including chairs, tables, and storage solutions.

subcategories.label: Lighting
subcategories.description: Indoor and outdoor lighting fixtures, including lamps, chandeliers, and string lights.

subcategories.label: Candles and Fragrances
subcategories.description: Candles, wax melts, and other home fragrances.

subcategories.label: Home Accessories
subcategories.description: Decorative items and accessories for the home, including vases, planters, and cushions.
